explains: int. 阿门（用于祈祷或圣歌结束时，表示诚心所愿）

sentences.en: We ask this through our Lord, Amen.
An Egyptian narrative of about 1080 BC, the Story of Wen-Amen, provides an insight into the scale of their trading activity.
sentences.cn: 一个大约公元前1080年有关文阿门的埃及故事，提供了一个了解他们贸易活动的规模的机会。

sentences.en: In your name we pray, Amen.
